column1: Smoque BBQ////I think Smoque is the best BBQ in Chicago.  We tried the Ribs (Baby Back and St. Louis) Pulled Pork
column5: and Cole Slaw.  Loved the Baby Back Ribs
column6: didn't care for the St. Louis Style.  Loved the briskett
column9: and the cole slaw was not good.  Great sauce and amazing flavor on the meat.  Went between meals around 2:30 and only had a few in front of us in line.
